name: Noisy Transcript
description: Transcript with background noise markers and filler words
transcript: Um, hi, [background noise] my name is, uh, Jennifer Brown. [coughing] Sorry about that. So, like, I really need help, you know? [unclear] I've been, um, struggling with, uh, keeping my apartment. [background voices] The rent is just too much and, like, I can't afford it anymore. I'm in, uh, Atlanta, Georgia. [noise] I also need, um, help with groceries and, you know, maybe some, uh, job training? [unclear audio] You can, uh, email me at jenbrown.help@email.com. [background noise] Thanks for, um, listening.
